item.title: Men's College Basketball 2025-26 Undefeated Teams Tracker: Michigan Beats Nebraska
item.description: Here are the men's college basketball teams that are still undefeated in the 2025-2026 season.

item.title: Izzo: Michigan State 'Got Lucky' Vs. Rutgers, Must 'Learn' Before Playing Michigan
item.description: No. 7 Michigan State was 'lucky' to beat Rutgers, but the Spartans can learn from their mistakes ahead of playing No. 3 Michigan.

item.title: Indiana Hands No. 12 Purdue 3rd Straight Loss
item.description: Indiana upset No. 12 Purdue as the Boilermakers lose a third straight game.

item.title: Darian Mensah Officially Joins Miami Hurricanes After Agreement With Duke
item.description: After settling legal battle with Duke, QB Darian Mensah has officially joined the Miami Hurricanes.

item.title: Super Bowl LX, NFL Buzz: Jon Gruden Not Interested in Jets' Job
item.description: Only four teams are still in the hunt for the Lombardi Trophy, but there's still plenty of news across the NFL.
